scripts.build: bun run --filter '@sugurutakahashi-1234/issue-number-branch-core' build && bun run --filter '@sugurutakahashi-1234/issue-number-branch-api' build && bun run --filter '@sugurutakahashi-1234/issue-number-branch' build && bun run --filter '@sugurutakahashi-1234/issue-number-branch-action' build
scripts.ci: bun run build && concurrently -n "pkg,e2e,docs,knip" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta" --hide "pkg,e2e,docs,knip" --timings --kill-others-on-fail "bun run --filter '*' --parallel ci" "bun run test:e2e" "bun run docs:update" "bun run knip"
scripts.test:coverage:html: bun test --coverage && bunx @lcov-viewer/cli lcov coverage/lcov.info -o coverage/html
scripts.docs:deps-graph: concurrently -n "overview,all,pkg" -c "cyan,green,yellow" --hide "overview,all,pkg" --timings --kill-others-on-fail "bun run docs:deps-graph:overview" "bun run docs:deps-graph:all" "bun run --filter '*' docs:deps-graph"
scripts.docs:update: concurrently -n "deps,knip,readme" -c "cyan,green,yellow" --hide "deps,knip,readme" --timings --kill-others-on-fail "bun run docs:deps-graph" "bun run docs:knip" "bun run docs:readme"
scripts.release:dry-run: bunx release-please release-pr --token=$(gh auth token) --repo-url=$(gh repo view --json nameWithOwner --jq '.nameWithOwner') --debug --dry-run
scripts.clean: bun run --filter '*' clean && rm -rf bun.lock node_modules dist coverage .*.bun-build *.tsbuildinfo
scripts.clean:build: bun run clean:install && bun run ci
